text:
"Bao" is a 2018 American computer-animated short film written and directed by Domee Shi and produced by Pixar Animation Studios. It was released with "Incredibles 2" on June 15, 2018.
The movie is about an aging and lonely Chinese-Canadian mother, suffering from empty nest syndrome, who gets a second chance at motherhood when she makes a steamed bun (baozi) that comes to life.
The movie won the Oscar for the Best Animated Short Film at the 91st Academy Awards.
